{"id":1150518939,"question_id":50,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"4 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1705651294,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1150518939/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Pow(x, n)","memory":"41.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public double myPow(double x, int n) {\n        \n        if(n==0) return 1;\n        \n        if(n == Integer.MIN_VALUE){  // to avoid Integer overflow\n            x = x * x;\n            n = n/2;\n        }\n\n        if(n<0){\n            n=-n;\n            x=1/x;\n        }\n        \n        if(n%2==0){\n            return myPow(x*x, n/2);\n        }else {\n            return  x*myPow(x*x, n/2);\n        }\n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"powx-n","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
